title: Fat Joe and Remy Ma Interview
itunes:title: Fat Joe and Remy Ma Interview
description:
Wednesday 2/15 - Today on the show the exclusive duo Fat Joe and Remy Ma came and joined us, to discuss their new album and so much more. Also, Angela Yee gave some advice to some listeners and Charlamagne gave another award to National Security Advisor Michael Flynn.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
